title: Rose Personalized Blanket, Custom Baby Blanket, Baby Shower Gift, Rose Nursery Blanket, Crib Blanket, Newborn Photos Prop, BB10
description: Baby BlanketThis blanket makes a perfect keepsake and baby shower gift for a mom to be.They are perfect for Hospital Gifts, Birth Announcements, Birthday Gifts, Christmas and just snuggling those precious babies.DETAILSDesign: Printed On One Side. Designs are printed using high quality inks that will not fade or peel. The fabric stays silky smooth against skin. This is NOT embroidery or vinylCare: Machine Wash; Tumble DryAvailable Materials: Fleece / Minky / Sherpa (dependent on size)Please Note: All sizes have a variance +/- 1"-2" due to heat causing shrinking when pressed.DISCLAIMER: Periodically tiny microfiber dots may occur – this is a natural occurrence in the fabric (mostly seen in fleece). They typically appear black, blue, orange or yellow in color. Once the fabric is washed, they usually are less visible. This is common in sublimation - caused by natural fiber particles!Please note with preconstructed items, exact symmetry is not guaranteed.*Please review photos for size references!*CUSTOM ORDERSI LOVE creating new designs but for a design that I do not currently offer please contact me before ordering to see if can create your request.HOW TO ORDER1. Choose the Size & Material for the drop down menu above (see photos for references)2. Add your Personalization requests (include the name(s), font, and color)3. Click "Add to Cart"4. Enter your payment information, shipping address, *DOUBLE CHECK EVERYTHING* and click "Order"5. Sit back and wait for your special package in the mail!RUSH ORDERSIf you are in a rush, I do offer an express production option.Please add this listing to your order-https://www.etsy.com/listing/498793304RELATED LISTINGSInterested in more personalized baby gifts? Look through the following listings to complete your order!https://www.etsy.com/shop/DashingFoxCoFAQS:.What material is most popular?Jersey is our most popular for baby swaddles because they're stretchy and are not thick.  Minky and Sherpa are our most popular for a standard baby blanket because of the softness and thickness.Are these personalized?Yes, the babies name will be changed to the one that is left in a note for me during checkout. If you would not like a name to be added you can leave the note blank or simply leave "No Name."Do you do custom designs?Absolutely! I love to make custom designs. Please contact me before ordering to make sure that I am able to produce the design you would like.Can the blanket be made in a different color?Sometimes, The text and parts of some designs can be made with a different color. Watercolor floral is not able to be changed however I can try to create something with floral in the color you are looking for. Please contact me before purchasing to make sure I can make the adjustments you would like.Can my order be rushed?Yes, if you need your order rushed, I do offer an express production option to have your order shipped quicker. Just apply it to your order:https://www.etsy.com/listing/498793304Can the fonts be changed?Absolutely!! Just include a note for me during checkout.What is Minky?Minky is a special type of plush fabric that is often used to make baby blankets, baby clothing and baby accessories. Minky fabric is like fleece – but softer and thicker.What is Jersey?It is a 100% lightweight polyester material that stretches. Perfect for swaddling. Features rounded corners.What is Fleece?Fleece blankets are made of 100% Polyester. It is a thinner blanket but provide a very vibrant print.What is Sherpa?Sherpa is an Ultra Plush blanket. It is a 100% polyester with a faux fur fabric on the back. The faux fur side is available in white. Tan back is available by request only.Will I receive a proof?We do not supply a proof of your personalized design as standard to ensure we do not delay your order, however if you would like to see the design before we create it please request this along with your personalization when you place your order. If requested we will not proceed with your order until you are 100% happy with the design. Please ensure you factor in extra time for this, as edits may delay your order.ADDITIONAL NOTES▹ Please keep in mind when ordering that color settings on monitors and lighting in product photography vary so the product might differ a tad from what you see on screen.▹ I don't accept returns, exchanges, or cancellations. But please contact me if you have any problems with your order.▹ If you have any questions, please use the “Message Seller” button next to the price and I’ll get right back to you.Remember to select the ♥ FAVORITE button to save this product for later!Thank you so much for shopping at DashingFoxCo!https://www.etsy.com/shop/DashingFoxCo© 2019 DashingFoxCo

We will crop out the background and isolate your dog's face from the photo.Our bookmarks are printed on glossy photo paper and are laminated to make them waterproof and scratch-resistant. The magnetic feature ensures they securely grip the page without slipping or damaging your precious books. Plus, they make wonderful gifts for fellow dog lovers, friends, family, or even yourself!Hello, We currently only accommodate proof requests for orders of 5+ bookmarks since they would all be on the same page and would not affect the production time of other orders. Multiple bookmark orders are printed on one page in order to be eco-friendly and not waste material. For this reason, if one order requests a proof and does not respond timely, it will delay the production process for multiple other orders. Unfortunately, this was our experience when accepting proof requests where we would not receive a response until days later 90% of the time, so we have pivoted away from proof requests in order to best meet our customers' needs. If you receive your order and have any quality-related issues, please do not hesitate to reach out.At FritoPaw, we take pride in our attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction. We pour our passion for pets into each bookmark we create, ensuring a high-quality, long-lasting keepsake that will bring joy to your reading moments for years to come.Grab yours now and embark on a whimsical journey through the pages of your favorite books, accompanied by the face of your beloved canine companion. Shop with confidence at FritoPaw – where creativity, quality, and canine cuteness converge.
